task.title: Retrieve a Note by ID
task.shortdesc: Use this endpoint to fetch the details of a single note by providing its unique identifier.

context.p: The GET /notes/{id} endpoint allows developers to retrieve a specific note. This is useful when you need to display or update note details in your application.

step.cmd: Replace {id} with the noteâ€™s unique identifier.
Include a valid authentication token in the request header.

result.p: The response contains the details of the requested note in JSON format. If the note does not exist, the API returns a 404 Not Found error.
